name: Huskbearers
description: Basic infantry of the Thornbound Choir, their bodies partially transformed by the sacred spores. They carry the remains of their former selves as vessels for the fungal growth.
abilities: Spore Carriers: When this model is destroyed, all friendly THORNBOUND CHOIR models within 6" gain +1 to their Resolve tests until the end of the round.
Fungal Symbiosis: This model can use its action to perform a Resolve test. If successful, it gains +1 to its Toughness until the end of the round.
